long_description: A lightweight, high-tech helmet for demanding riders, the Cannondale Teramo Bike Helmet delivers excellent protection along with 23 highly breathable vents. 23 vents help move air into, through and out of the helmet to keep you cool. Tough polycarbonate shell is molded directly to the EPS foam to create a strong, single-piece helmet. Dual-density EPS foam features internal cone shaping to help disperse impact forces. Alloy exoskeleton works along with the internal roll cage to supply reinforcement across the vent bridges. Rear retention harness customizes sizing with a single, micro-adjusting dial; plush EVA padding doesn't absorb moisture or odors. Comfortable webbing straps with cam-lock dividers offer easy, secure adjustment for a personalized fit. The Cannondale Teramo Bike Helmet features moisture-wicking pads to enhance comfort and keep sweat under control.
